content.html: Me in 2019: “I’m not spending £20k on solar panels, it’ll take 24 years for them to pay for themselves!” 2023: “Bugger, those £20k solar panels would have paid for themselves in 24 months…” 2025: “Bugger, those £20k solar panels would have paid for themselves in 24 days…”
content.value:
Me in 2019: “I’m not spending £20k on solar panels, it’ll take 24 years for them to pay for themselves!”

2023: “Bugger, those £20k solar panels would have paid for themselves in 24 months…”

2025: “Bugger, those £20k solar panels would have paid for themselves in 24 days…”
